additional_requirement: analyze the ethical implications of using deepfake technology in media
discuss the challenges in regulating autonomous vehicle technology and its impact on road safety
identify and explain common types of scams in the cryptocurrency market
evaluate the ethical concerns of influencer marketing with respect to consumer manipulation
discuss the ethical considerations and potential biases in AI applications for healthcare
analyze the sources and impact of misinformation on climate change policies
discuss privacy risks and data security in smart home devices
explore the challenges in regulating biometric data and its implications for privacy
discuss the role of ethical hacking in improving cybersecurity and the ethical boundaries involved
evaluate the challenges in regulating VR content to prevent psychological harm
